text: "Flawless" is a 2013 song by Beyoncé. It was taken from her fifth studio album Beyoncé. It was remixed by Nicki Minaj as a single in 2014. It made number 65 in the United Kingdom, number 41 in the United States and number 77 in Ireland. ==Remixes== In March 2014, rapper M.I.A. posted videos on her Instagram account showing a remix of "Flawless" was played. On May 13, she released a remix of the song called "Baddygirl 2". In 2014, rapper Lil' Kim released her remix after the official remix of the song featuring Nicki Minaj was released. Her version was a diss track made at Minaj for Minaj calling herself "the queen of rap,". == Remix with Nicki Minaj == A remix of "Flawless" with rapper Nicki Minaj, called "Flawless Remix", was released on Beyoncé's website on August 2, 2014. Columbia Records released this version as a single on August 12, 2014. The song was at number 41 on the US Billboard Hot 100 after being released as a digital download, included in the reissued version of Beyoncé, subtitled Platinum Edition. ==References== Category:2013 songs Category:Beyoncé songs Category:Nicki Minaj songs Category:Reggae songs
title: Flawless (song)
